name: bloodplusfight-line-chatbot
description: Enhanced LINE chatbot with healthcare information for HIV/STDs deployed on Cloudflare Workers

scripts.build: echo 'Build completed - no transpilation needed for ES modules'
scripts.db:migrate: wrangler d1 execute line-chatbot-dev --file migrations/0001_initial_schema.sql && wrangler d1 execute line-chatbot-dev --file migrations/0002_analytics_schema.sql && wrangler d1 execute line-chatbot-dev --file migrations/0003_healthcare_schema.sql
scripts.db:migrate:staging: wrangler d1 execute line-chatbot-staging --file migrations/0001_initial_schema.sql --env staging && wrangler d1 execute line-chatbot-staging --file migrations/0002_analytics_schema.sql --env staging && wrangler d1 execute line-chatbot-staging --file migrations/0003_healthcare_schema.sql --env staging
scripts.db:migrate:production: wrangler d1 execute line-chatbot-production --file migrations/0001_initial_schema.sql --env production && wrangler d1 execute line-chatbot-production --file migrations/0002_analytics_schema.sql --env production && wrangler d1 execute line-chatbot-production --file migrations/0003_healthcare_schema.sql --env production
scripts.analytics: wrangler d1 execute line-chatbot-dev --command "SELECT * FROM healthcare_analytics_summary LIMIT 10"
scripts.analytics:staging: wrangler d1 execute line-chatbot-staging --command "SELECT * FROM healthcare_analytics_summary LIMIT 10" --env staging
scripts.analytics:production: wrangler d1 execute line-chatbot-production --command "SELECT * FROM healthcare_analytics_summary LIMIT 10" --env production

author: Bloodplusfight Team
